main event: A bright flying object was observed at medium altitude flying from northwest to southeast over the Atlantic Ocean.
interesting points: The object was observed from a ship, the SS President Jackson, at coordinates 38.0°N, 42.38°W.
The sighting occurred at 17/063021 (May 17, 1964 at 6:30 UTC).
The object's speed could not be estimated.
The weather conditions at the time were partly cloudy with a barometric pressure of 29 inches Hg and a temperature of 29°F.
The sighting was reported to the Department of the Air Force as part of Project Blue Book, their official UFO investigation program.
witnesses: Crew of the SS President Jackson
photographs: Yes, but not included in the report
